title: jagamengum pugazhum shrInivAsan
sahitya:
jagamengum pugazhum shrInivAsan tanakku sheidAr jAnavAsam


anupallavi

  tagha taghavenna alankArangaL shUTTi tANDavak-kudiraigaL sArATTil pUTTi 
nagha naghavenna tOraNangaL ATTi naDu naDuvil kaNNanukku upacAram kATTi


caraNam    puttoLitta narkkavari pUccaviri cinnam tannai ponnulagha mangaiyargaL vIsa 
punnakai mukhattuDanE cinnam shiru tOzhargaL pOnavarkkum vandavarkkum candaNangaL pUsa
